info.name: Tumblr Hivemind Killer
info.description: Sometimes you just want to see if someone has posted opinions on a post on Tumblr. Good luck sifting through 10000+ notes of silent likes and reblogs to find the one piece of interesting commentary, though! Introducing Tumblr Hivemind Killer - a script that, when browsing the notes to a post, only displays people who have reblogged with commentary. This works both on your dashboard and on blogs. See this post for more.
info.additionalInfo: v.1.03 (Mar 4, 2015): Fixed a bug with the replies and the answers not being displayed in the retag version. v.1.02 (Feb 17, 2015): Added Retags support. Now you can choose to additionally display tags on reblogs while the Hivemind Killer is activated. v.1.01 (Aug 13, 2013): Added replies and answers as displayed as well.
